channel.title: Moparscape client... I need help!
channel.description: Hi there. My name's Kristine and I've been pking on runescape for over 5 years. And since they took away the wilderness as we knew it I have quit rs. Now, I know there are many many servers out there made for pking, but I use a macintosh computer and can't get Silabsoft to work anymore. I"ve come back to good oldd mopar to see if anyone can help me. Does anyone know of a way to upload scrips to the mopar client on mac? Does anyone know a good private server that has it's own webclient or a client that works on mac? and finally. Does anyone know how to get silabsoft to work on macs again? I know many many mac users are having difficulty. Sorry if i had many typos english is my second language.

item.title: Moparscape client... I need help!
item.dc:creator: @xoxkrstnxox xoxkrstnxox
item.description:
@xoxkrstnxox wrote:

Hi there. My name’s Kristine and I’ve been pking on runescape for over 5 years. And since they took away the wilderness as we knew it I have quit rs. Now, I know there are many many servers out there made for pking, but I use a macintosh computer and can’t get Silabsoft to work anymore. I"ve come back to good oldd mopar to see if anyone can help me. Does anyone know of a way to upload scrips to the mopar client on mac? Does anyone know a good private server that has it’s own webclient or a client that works on mac? and finally. Does anyone know how to get silabsoft to work on macs again? I know many many mac users are having difficulty. Sorry if i had many typos english is my second language.

Read full topic
